sentences.en: A white cane sofa is sumptuously upholstered in gold taffeta and purple velvet.
sentences.cn: 白藤沙发上配有金色塔夫绸和紫色天鹅绒制成的沙发垫，显得豪华而精致。

sentences.en: I might have to paint in a taffeta dress or something!
sentences.cn: 我得加画上一条塔夫绸女裙或者别的什么东西.

sentences.en: I'll buy Mammy some red taffeta and have an elegant petticoat made. "
sentences.cn: 我就给嬷嬷买块红府绸,让她做一条漂亮裙子吧.

sentences.en: It started earlier this year when Louis Vuitton sent models down its autumn/winter catwalk in black taffeta versions.
sentences.cn: 这个趋势开始于今年早些时候路易•威登在它的秋/冬季黑色塔夫绸版本的时装表演上。

sentences.en: Main production is prevented south the filament breed such as cloth, taffeta, own fair market share.
sentences.cn: 主要生产防南布 、 塔夫绸等长丝品种, 占有一定的市场份额.

sentences.en: Te: Of course, except velvet and taffeta, all can be worn.
sentences.cn: (当然可以了.除了天鹅绒和塔夫绸外, 其它料子的衣服都可以穿. )

sentences.en: These Wedding Dresses with Sleeves are usually made of luxury materials like velvet, silk, and taffeta.
sentences.cn: 这些带有袖子的结婚礼服通常都是选用一些奢华的布料例如丝绒、丝绸、塔夫绸。

trans.tran_cn: 似塔夫绸的；塔夫绸做的

trans.tran_en: a shiny stiff cloth made from silk or  nylon
